name: Green Bean Fighting Machine
description:
WASD to move

Left Mouse to shoot

R to reload


If you wait, there is a boss fight!
Unfortunately, I did not have much time to make this game, due to school. This is my second game jam. I used Godot to make the game. It was fun making the game, I hope you enjoy it. The entire game is made by me, except for the font. The font was made by Milena Brandao, on google fonts.
